entry.title: No Compasses, No Signs
entry.summary:
Author: Starlighter_Varda

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 135,373Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 460

Summary: Between dealing with Gotham and the child he’d impulsively adopted, the last thing Bruce Wayne needed was to develop strong yet confusing feelings for the reporter Clark Kent.To make things worse, his rivals for Clark's affections are Lex Luthor and Superman!The maddening desire, jealousy, and distraction stemming from his fixation on this man are almost manageable...until Superman starts showing an interest in the Batman.________________Or, How Bruce Wayne's Sexuality Crisis Led to Him Accidentally Baby-Trapping Superman.

entry.title: As You Pass Me On The Way Down
entry.summary:
Author: theFamousLivingDead

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,078Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: C: I bet you wouldn't be able to go a week without me. Their thread falls silent for a moment, which makes Clark's face go uncomfortably cold. His fingers are already starting to type some bullshit distraction, anything to get Bruce back to him when-- B: I can.B: You think I can't?C: B.. I didn't mean it like that.B: No, you did. Fine. Let's do it. A week without sex. It started as a challenge; what if Bruce Wayne had to go through a week without sex? Clark is about to find out just how sexually driven his boyfriend is, while Bruce throws all possible tricks at Clark to get him to submit to his innate desires. Or: Bruce is VERY horny and Clark has to come to terms with the fact that he is, in fact, a simp for Bruce.

entry.title: The Raven Roosts in the Cornflower Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Aurora2Sunset

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,064Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Someone new moved to Smallville, in the house on the other side of the Kent farm. Clark meets the new kid, Bruce Wayne, and his first impression isn't great. He thinks that Bruce is spoiled and rude and out of place. Maybe that's why he blows up at him. But he still saves him when he's in trouble, that's just the kind of person that Clark is. After a while they develop a tentative kind of friendship over the summer. Bruce isn't like anyone else that Clark knows, and he feels connected to him in all of his out of place-ness. His own feelings for the other take him by surprise, he only hopes that he can stomp them down before he ruins their friendship over them. - Smallville AU where Bruce spends the summers there and befriends Clark long before either of them become superheroes.

entry.title: Dark Days and Lost Suns
entry.summary:
Author: Athena_Faymont

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 199,946Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 195

Summary: Clark admires Batman, the man who has given up civilian life to protect everyone else's, the tough, sharp, and compassionate man. Bruce admires Superman, the alien who, despite being able to dominate them all by force, has decided to take care of a planet that isn't his own.And, even with these two flawed principles, neither of them can imagine how alone the other feels... and how alone they themselves are. This is a long story, the superbat fanfic I've always wanted to write about how, within the canon, one day something changes and they find each other. If you want to join me on this adventure, we'll be here every Friday! [Puedes encontrarlo en español en mi perfil.]

entry.title: Miss the Mark
entry.summary:
Author: elihinata

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,236Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 1,046

Summary: Clark Kent has never shaken the feeling that he doesn’t quite belong. He grew up learning to hide—his strength, his heritage, his very self—all to protect a secret that kept him at arm’s length from everyone around him. And yet, nothing made him feel more alone than discovering the one thing his Kryptonian biology denied him: a soulmate. While every human carried a mark guiding them to someone meant just for them, Clark carried nothing. No promise. No destined other. The more time passes, the heavier that truth becomes, aching under his skin until it finally breaks him. One night, overwhelmed by longing and starved for a connection he fears he’ll never have, Clark gives in to a single reckless impulse. He kisses the one person he trusts most in this world—his best friend, Bruce Wayne.

entry.title: The Cost Of Loving You
entry.summary:
Author: ClarkKents_Biceps

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,779Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 5

Summary: “WHAT THE FUCK BRUCE?” Bruce stood still looking up at Clark with a smirk on his face — he did not know what he was doing, this was all the drugs taking control of him. “What? You jealous?” He came up close to Clark, lips centimeters away from him. Clark pushed Bruce away lightly as he paced the room and pressed the bridge of his nose, “I don't even know what to say Bruce..” He blinked rapidly as if that might help him gather his surroundings and slightly sober up because he had so many things piled up in his mind to say but they weren’t coming out. “What? You gonna say that you’re disappointed in me? That i was doing so well and now i fucked everything up? Huh? Is that what you were gonna say Clark!? WELL FUCKING SAY IT ALREADY!” Bruce’s tone increased noticeably as he shoved Clark in the chest. “WHY BRUCE? WHY?” Clark stared at the other boy, anger completely gone but now filled with concern.
